column1: 7121,"Crane, Hoist and Lift Operators",,"Operate cranes, hoists or other moving or lifting equipment
column5: Weigh materials to ensure compliance with specifications
column7: Review work orders or schedules to determine operations or procedures
column9: Direct material handling or moving activities
column13: Inspect material-moving equipment to detect problems
column15: Maintain material moving equipment in good working condition
column21: Install parts, assemblies or attachments in transportation or material-handling equipment
column25: Signal others to coordinate vehicle movement
